alert.note: Alert for Debeque to Silt Corridor; Grand and Battlement Mesas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 04 at 12:26PM MDT until further notice by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Plateau Creek near Cameo affecting Debeque to Silt Corridor and Grand and Battlement Mesas. .Warm temperatures may melt snowpack and increase river flows.
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Residents and those recreating along or near the creek should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. COZ007-009-051900- /O.CON.KGJT.FL.A.0004.000000T0000Z-000000T0000Z/ /PCCC2.0.MC.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NR/ 1226 PM MDT Sun Jun 4 2023 ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Plateau Creek from Collbran to the confluence with the Colorado River near Cameo. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Water will approach homes in the low-lying areas adjacent to Plateau Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM MDT Sunday, June 4 the stage was 5.6 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached in the coming days. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

area.areaDesc: Debeque to Silt Corridor; Grand and Battlement Mesas
